contents:
Opinion by
Mr. Chief Justice Schaffer,
For the reasons stated in Green v. Milk Control Commission, 340 Pa. 1, 16 A. 2d 9, the decree is affirmed at appellant’s cost.
Mr. Justice Stern and Mr. Justice Patterson dissent for the reasons set forth in the dissenting opinion filed in the case of Green v. Milk Control Commission, 340 Pa. 1, 16 A. 2d 9.
